definitions.definition: house; home; apartment (Classifier: 所; 棟／栋; 幢; 座; 套)

parsedExamples.example: 蓋房子 / 盖房子  ―  gài fángzi  ―  to build a house
房子前面是禾場。 / 房子前面是禾场。  ―  Fángzi qiánmiàn shì héchǎng.  ―  The threshing floor is in front of the house.

parsedExamples.translation: Wǒ de fángzi yǒu yī gè xiǎo yuànzi. [Pinyin]
Shǐmìsī jiē shàng de fángzi zhèngzài pāimài. [Pinyin]

examples: 蓋房子 / 盖房子  ―  gài fángzi  ―  to build a house
房子前面是禾場。 / 房子前面是禾场。  ―  Fángzi qiánmiàn shì héchǎng.  ―  The threshing floor is in front of the house.
